jee form kab aayega: 📝 *JEE Form*: Forms usually come out in December–January on jeemain.nta.nic.in.
jee 2026 kitne attempts hain: 🔁 *JEE 2026 Attempts*: Usually 2 attempts in a year — January and April.
neet form kab aayega: 📅 *NEET Form*: Forms typically release in February–March on neet.nta.nic.in.
